title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
For Task A, the response must correctly describe why countries have presidential electoral rules.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain a presidential electoral rule that is important in determining election outcomes in two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

For Task C, for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in Task B, explain how the electoral rule serves a political objective
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
